website_summaries.verdict: Even if many have followed the footsteps and tried to imitate the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star, its history and the mark that it made on the sneaker industry only proves its success. With the Seasonal Ox, the brand displays how timeless its silhouette is as it continues to be relevant despite minor tweaks. The collection features a mix of neutral and vibrant colorways, all remaining to be pleasing to the eyes. Users can guarantee its versatile style, for it can be styled in infinite ways.
pros: A significant number of consumers note that nothing can beat the versatility of these sneakers
Not only can they be taken from casual to formal occasions as they can match various outfits, but different generations also favor them
Several purchasers enjoy the convenience that these can be thrown in the wash without compromising its quality after
Numerous shoppers note that these are a must and a great addition to anyone's wardrobe
The colorways on the All Star Seasonal Ox are unusual in a good way, according to a couple of reviewers
Many online commenters are delighted with the compliments that they have received from wearing these sneakers
The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Seasonal Ox is a classic twist on the iconic shoe
Although these are not the most comfortable sneakers, these can accommodate orthotics
One particularly likes the sole as it is well-constructed and provides excellent traction
Few testers mention that this break-in nicely
One user who had surgery on both feet found this as a great option as it is stylish and comfortable than wearing orthopedics
cons: A high number of testers do not recommend these for people who require arch support
Some of those who have purchased are not fans of the velvet look of the upper
Several buyers hope that there is a wide width option
A couple of consumers encountered problems of keeping the tongue in place

customer_reviews.title: Fake Fake Fake
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my daughter and when they arrived they definatley did not look the quality of Converse at all. The sizing is way off and she couldn’t even get them on!! Please do not buy these- they are definate fakes. Thought it was too good to be true for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I recently received the Shoes this morning, they fit very well and are quite comfortable. Thank you so much for everything. They are quite smart as well.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne k cruickshank

customer_reviews.title: Love these - great fit and look nice
customer_reviews.text: Love these - great fit and look nice. Only problem is that a month on, they're still rubbing my little toe on both feet. I'm assured this will stop happening eventually - I do hope so!
customer_reviews.author: K. Young

customer_reviews.title: Not original
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, I own several pairs and know the look and feel of converse shoes. Returned same day.
customer_reviews.author: The Sebs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them nothing beats real original converse but dont pay too much as patience rewards those who wait
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Came in the wrong colour but amazon fixed this, happy with the outcome
customer_reviews.author: Robs

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: There are so many colours to choose from but for the greatly reduced price, I'm very happy with these. Just love the size 6.5 converse, they fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I expected have owned these before and definitely the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Best colour Converse
customer_reviews.text: My favourite colour of Converse. The fit nicely, and...they're Converse. You know what you're getting, not much more to say.
customer_reviews.author: Aviv Or

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: I believe these to be fake converse.... my reasoning for this is I have had most of my other converse trainers for 4 years plus and they just have basic wear and tear, had these for 4 days and worn twice yet already falling apart!!!! Ripped off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't last for long.
customer_reviews.text: Less than 2 weeks in and the glue is starting to come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: great packaging, sizing is good very
customer_reviews.text: bought for husbands birthday,arrived quickly,great packaging,sizing is good very happy
customer_reviews.author: gilly42

customer_reviews.title: there smart
customer_reviews.text: A present for the wife, but if your tired of your significant other wearing horrid kicks buy these, there smart as
customer_reviews.author: Beef Stake

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: They're lovely sneakers. Fit beautifully and very well made. I also like the colour, burgundy though I wish it was darker.
customer_reviews.author: Mo5

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Quite nice. Not out there, my sister liked them after losing hers. Feel quite solid and well made
customer_reviews.author: samn

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'll order good old converse from Internet store. All time classics!
customer_reviews.author: Katarzyna Wronska

customer_reviews.title: Classic trainer
customer_reviews.text: If youre looking for a trainer to actually do sport with then these arent for you. If on the other hand you want to be just extremely comfortable whilst walking around then these are the chaps. Classic design which look great, if youre over 30 stick to the classic black to avoid looking like a student.
customer_reviews.author: generalmont

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cant go wrong with converse, very comfy, durable shoes... no doubt will purchase again soon
customer_reviews.author: SBuckley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, love the colour and the fact that I can get converse in a 5.5 unlike in stores.
customer_reviews.author: melsipop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought for my daughter, never see them off her feet!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie R.

customer_reviews.title: This is not really the good size, it's a bit too large for me
customer_reviews.text: This is not really the good size, it's a bit too large for me. I'm French and I have some troubles with UK sizes but that's alright. I love those shoes ! The pack was dispatched in time, any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alysonn Donath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: had these before in a different colour...thrilled there was a size five and a half
customer_reviews.author: Chris  and liz James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price compared to High Street!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 11 year old son. We saw these in a high street shoe shop at £50, so I was delighted to find them much cheaper on Amazon. He loves them and they are very comfy. He's worn them constantly and not had a blisters so no need to wear in!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Randall-Davies

customer_reviews.title: teenage son delighted with them
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest converse I'd seen online or in store, teenage son delighted with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these! Would recommend as good value for money

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about Converse other than they are fabulous? not much!

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace an identical pair I had worn out. Great shoes, great value, I just need to wear them in so they are as comfy as my old pair.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Third pair of Converse so I guess that speaks for itself.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: For my mums birthday present! Came very quickly, came in the official all star box which I was pleased about! Would highly recommend :)

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new converse. Another pair to add to the collection. Good fit.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: My size is 40 (european size from previous orders) and I got a 39.5 eventhough i was expecting a smaller size it was much bigger...

customer_reviews.text: They were to big otherwise they look great and the colour is brill

customer_reviews.title: as expected and a good price. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: ... arrived later than expected but so far Im so happy with my new shoes
customer_reviews.text: the delivery arrived later than expected but so far Im so happy with my new shoes :D
customer_reviews.author: Marie Heinsalu

customer_reviews.title: I would like to swap for size 6
customer_reviews.text: It's to big,I would like to swap for size 6,5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But I just love them xx
customer_reviews.text: Got for Xmas pressie for my daughter ... But I just love them xx
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina trueman

customer_reviews.title: Converse Chucks
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in perfect condition. However, size was larger than expected and had to return them. No problems with refund but had to pay the heafty postage charge and would recommend others to buy from a shop and try them on first. Clearly this recommendation is being censored!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A.Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Frustration
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an English size 5 and thought 38 was right but it is not it is a 5 1/2. Spent endless time trying to organise returning them. I cannot find a number to call as they were not picked up and need to re arrange. I need some help as finding I am going round in circles. Why don't people communicate anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Anne S

customer_reviews.title: First pair of converse
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and granddaughter have been badgering me for ages to get some converse, and I am so pleased I have. They are so comfortable, and bang on trend. These won't be my only pair!
customer_reviews.author: P C Mills

customer_reviews.title: Quality poor - threading has split on rim.
customer_reviews.text: I have only been wearing this product for about 6 weeks and the threading has started to split and come away. I fear it won't be long until I need to dispose of them. A pair of £35 pumps should be lasting long then this. As they are outside of warranty I am unable to return (even as faulty). It's a shame because i really like them and was going to order some more in a different colour. I won't be now unless these can get replaced (pictures attached).
customer_reviews.author: Cyphex85

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately these started to fall apart in less than a ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these started to fall apart in less than a week, the rubber was coming away from the canvas on both shoes. Very disappointing. I contacted the seller and they said, wear and tear happens. But after a week! Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money and perfect fit! Delivery was quick and arrived a few days after I ordered it! Overall very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: hannah jones

customer_reviews.title: Very poor !
customer_reviews.text: As usual just like all the converse I buy which is a LOT the life of these is short lived, the sides of the soles always give away within 1-2 months of light use !!!
customer_reviews.author: Damjo
